backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, statistics, channel status management, and access‑controlled admin/user actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring metadata, PWA settings, icons, and orientation locking for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, orientation, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing GPRS‑optimized caching for static assets, runtime caching, and network rules for radio streams.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component initializing React Query, themes, audio and station state, orientation locking, and lazy-loaded 3D scene.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player handling playback, retries, errors, volume, and emitting playback state via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/AudioSpectrumAna: Canvas-based audio spectrum visualizer using Web Audio API with responsive sizing and smooth animations.
frontend/src/components/BlinkingStars.ts: Three.js component rendering blinking, animated starfield with randomized positions and twinkle effects.
frontend/src/components/DonationModal.ts: Modal showing donation addresses with themed blocks and copy-to-clipboard interaction.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying developer credit with gradient text.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading UI with animated radio icon, text, and bouncing indicators.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Manages a deferred PWA install prompt with timed display, dismissal persistence, and install handling.
frontend/src/components/RadioPlaybackDis: Displays current station info, flag, share button, and bookmark controls for a playing station.
frontend/src/components/RadioTowerOverla: Renders animated radio‑wave rings and a radio tower icon overlay.
frontend/src/components/SearchOverlay.ts: Full‑screen searchable station list with filtering, keyboard handling, and selection UI.
frontend/src/components/SpaceScene.tsx: Three.js scene component rendering a black background and blinking stars.
frontend/src/components/TopToolbar.tsx: Toolbar for search, login, refresh, and donation actions, integrating station loading and identity management.
frontend/src/components/UserDashboard.ts: User dashboard showing bookmarks, session state, and statistics with escape/backdrop handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmark IDs using localStorage and a custom event to sync state across components.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements multi‑layer caching and IndexedDB storage for radio station data with lazy loading and cache‑clearing utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode, portrait‑lock behavior, glow utilities, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/serviceWorkerRegistration.t: Registers and manages the service worker for PWA offline support and update handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters, including hash‑route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, border radii, glow shadows, and animation keyframes for UI effects including accordions, fades, slides, and signal waves.
PACKAGING_GUIDE.md: Guide describing which project folders and files to include or exclude when creating a distributable ZIP package.
project_state.json: Describes the project's architecture, features, known issues, and state metadata for a global radio streaming PWA with React, R3F, and a Motoko backend.
README.md: Project overview describing the 3D globe radio app, its main features, and high-level structure.
SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Quick setup guide outlining prerequisites and steps to run Global FM locally.
unknown.txt: Provides support tips for packaging issues and includes a brief footer note.
